name: Fewer but Stronger
description:
A game for the third Blackthorn gamejam. You have to destroy all purple blocks with projectiles, the more projectiles on the screen at once, the less power they have. You  play for a best time; rationing your bullets for good damage and speed is one of the main challenges of the game.

Credits

keerok (me) - code, "art" and the music

freesounds.org - the sound effects

u/AlienProduction - for the outlined text script https://www.reddit.com/r/gamemaker/comments/3ryb11/basic_outlined_text_script/

Made with Game Maker
